description: portrait bust of a man with curly hair and beard facing left, looking down; sash over PL shoulder; oval enclosed in a rectangle with garland border
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on plate below image in black: [ Ernestus Casimirus Com. Nassaviæ, Cat. Viand./ Doetz Dñ in Bielstein, Gub\'r Frisiæ, Groen. Oml./ Drent. Militæ illi Unit Provin. Belg. Ord. Marescallus/ C. Damkert exc.]; on sheet in pencil: [1-336]
title: Portrait of Ernestus Casimirus
